channel.title: How to make your scripts work
channel.description: Hi. I need help making scripts work cause I have a shop script that is called "Dragon Mercantile." When you get into my server you will be able to buy or sell or auction items. I need to make my shop come to life so please help me.

item.title: How to make your scripts work
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=".Steph, post:5, topic:108393"]If it doesn’t work, use Mod Tharanoks Compiler.
(Sorry if I spelt your name wrong)[/quote]

For the record; it’s Mod Taharok

Read full topic
item.source: How to make your scripts work

item.title: How to make your scripts work
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Willie948, post:3, topic:108393”]Wait woa, waaaa.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2007, 07:23:39 PM[/size][hr][quote author=© CopyRight © link=topic=155179.msg1459366#msg1459366 date=1181455492]
you have to compile it…
[/quote]
how do i do that[/quote]

Go into your source file and look for a file that says “Compile.bat” run it.

Read full topic
